Ayoka Olufunmilayo Adebambo bụ onye sayénsị Naijiria na prọfesọ nke Animal Breeding and Genetics. Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ prọfesọ nke Animal Breeding and Genetics. Na Septemba 2010, e nyere ya ọnọdụ nke Fellow nke Animal Science Association of Nigeria (ASAN).
Prọfesọ Ayoka malitere ọrụ ya na Mahadum Ibadan dị ka onye na-eme ngagharị iwe tupu ọ kwaga na Institute of Agricultural Research and Training nke Mahadụm Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife
Mgbe ọ nọ na Ile-Ife, o lekwasịrị anya n'imeziwanye ụdị ezì maka ebumnuche nke ịzụ ahịa
N'afọ 1993, ọ kwagara na Ngalaba nke Ịzụ Anụmanụ na Genetics, Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta, Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye otu Kansụl N'achị Mahadum ugbu a.

N'afọ 2010, Ayoka natara onyinye nke Fellow nke Animal Science Association of Nigeria (ASAN) n'akụkụ ndị ọka nke iri na isii mmụta sayensị ndị ọzọ. E depụtara ya na ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria 16 a ma ama na Silverbird TV na sayensị na nyocha. Ayoka nwetakwara onyinye British Council Award na Commonwealth Fellowship.
